definition: luxuriant/buxom/variant of 豐|丰[feng1]/variant of 風|风[feng1]/appearance/charm

sentences.english: Spend a year of plenty the way you spend a year of want and remind yourself of famine even when the barn is full.
sentences.chinese: 丰年要当歉年过，有粮常想无粮时。

sentences.english: It is a good year for fruit.
At the same time, the artificial populations should be expanded from seeds collected in years of high seed set.
sentences.chinese: 丰年应适时采种，就地育苗，扩大人工种群。

sentences.english: In good years corn is hay, in ill years straw is corn.
sentences.chinese: 丰年五谷贱如草，荒年稻草贵如粮。

sentences.english: There is no prospect of good harvest, we can not see Snow's dignified.
sentences.chinese: 没有丰年的前景，我们不可能看到瑞雪的端庄。

sentences.english: Under water, famine; under snow, bread.
sentences.chinese: 洪水造饥馑，瑞雪兆丰年。

sentences.english: As the saying goes "Snow Mega Year" is a good year next year.
sentences.chinese: 俗话说“瑞雪兆丰年”明年是个好年头。

definition: abundant harvest of all food crops/bumper grain harvest
favorable weather (idiom); good weather for crops
long-lived people, rich harvests (idiom); stable and affluent society/prosperity
character (of a person, verse, object etc)/style
to plow a field in the spring
